text: David Robert Sime Cumming from the University of Glasgow, Glasgow, UK, was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for contributions to integrated sensors and microsystem technology. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Scottish engineers Category:Academics of the University of Glasgow Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: David Robert Sime Cumming
